criteria.name: Completeness
criteria.description: All required sections must be present and fully populated.
checklist: YAML frontmatter (title, category, tags, version, date, difficulty, platform)
Description (2-3 sentences, enterprise-focused)
Use Cases (5 specific scenarios)
Prompt (detailed template with square-bracket variables)
Variables (with realistic example values)
Example Usage (Input/Output with 200+ lines of detailed scenario)
Tips (6-7 actionable, specific recommendations)
Related Prompts (3-5 cross-references)
Changelog (version 1.0 entry)

criteria.name: Example Quality
criteria.description: Examples must be realistic, detailed, and free of placeholders.
checklist: Scenario uses actual data (no 'replace placeholder' text)
Input/Output demonstrates a complex, real-world use case
Example length is sufficient (>150 lines) to show depth
Includes quantifiable metrics ($, %, time savings)

criteria.name: Specificity
criteria.description: Content must be specific to the domain and actionable.
checklist: Tips are actionable and specific (not generic 'check your work')
Variables have realistic, domain-specific example values
Use cases are concrete and distinct

criteria.name: Format Adherence
criteria.description: Must strictly follow the markdown and YAML standards.
checklist: Valid YAML frontmatter
Correct markdown headers (H1, H2, H3)
Square-bracket variables used consistently in prompt and examples

criteria.name: Enterprise Quality
criteria.description: Must be suitable for professional/enterprise use.
checklist: References industry frameworks (ISO, PMI, NIST, etc.)
Professional, objective tone
Addresses security, compliance, or scalability where relevant
